bike.description: 6061 TIG-welded aluminum, Hudson laid-back design with low ride height
bike.paint_description: M: Electric Blue, Gloss Black or Kiwi   F: Cataloupe, Daiquiri Blue or Sangria

components.description: Alex C1000 alloy rims, 36H, Formula alloy QR front & Hi-Stop coaster brake rear, 14g black electro-plated spokes
Jamis Sport Comfort, 26 x 1.95", with silver stripe
Forged alloy crank, single 42T chainring, 170mm, with full length chainguard
Hi-rise comfort, 15JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 80mm rise x 640mm wide
Alloy micro-adjust, 31.6 x 350mm, with alloy QR clamp
Jamis Comfort with extra foam padding, synthetic suede top, burnished side panels and bumper springs
